name: Cake Stacks #randomicon
description:
This little cat is desperate for some cake but don't let him grab a bite, because it might be a total mess. Balance your way to the top and build the tallest cake ever!

CONTROLS
Tap or click - drop cakes
Double-tap or double-click - start again (on game over)

This game was inspired by the following icons from #randomicon. Grab a draft and get creative!
